text: Arabsalim () is a populated area in Nabatiyeh District, in southern Lebanon. ==Location== Arabsalim is located 87 km from Beirut, at an altitude of 700 meters above sea level* Aarab Salim, Localiban == History == The town’s name, which comes from the Phoenician language, also appears in Pharaonic records as Rab Salim or “the god of peace.” Found here is a shrine to the prophet Salim, which has important archeological significance. ==See also== *Mohamad Issa ==References== ==External links== * Aarab Salim, Localiban Category:Populated places in Lebanon Category:Populated places in Nabatieh Governorate Category:Nabatieh District
title: Arabsalim
